summary: WHILE DRIVING THE STEERING BOLT BECAME LOSE WHICH CAUSED THE STEERING WHEEL TO JUMP AROUND.  WHICH MADE IT DIFFICULT FOR THE CONSUMER TO STEER THE VEHICLE.  *NLM    THE STEERING KNUCKLE RIPPED OUT AND THE CRADLE BROKE CAUSING EVERYTHING UNDER THE HOOD TO FALL OUT.  THE CRADLE HAD TO BE REPLACED.    *TT  *JB
